name: Growth Marketing
description: Growth Marketing is a Minneapolis, MN based SEO Company founded in 2013 by Brad Broekema, an SEO Consultant. We have a variety of strategies and packages to grow your business with search engine optimization, video marketing, local directory listings and paid media. We have created plans that can help small budding businesses as well as large national companies, our primary focus is businesses that have an established reputation and are ready to take their business to the next level.
